 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעַק‎</span> **verb** ==cry, cry out, call== (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָעַק‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> perhaps originally ***sound as thunder***, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***thunderbolt***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bellow*** (of bull)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.39|1Kgs 20:39]]; [[Lam.2.18|Lam 2:18]], 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽעֲקָה‎</span> [[Deut.22.24|Deut 22:24]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְעַק‎</span> [[Exod.23.22|Exod 23:22]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצַעֲקִי‎</span> [[Jer.22.20|Jer 22:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּצֳעָ֑קִי‎</span> v[[Jer.22.20|Jer 22:20]] feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְעַקְנָה‎</span> [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעֹק‎</span> [[Exod.22.22|Exod 22:22]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְעֹק‎</span> [[2Kgs.8.3|2Kgs 8:3]] ***Participle*** feminine singular absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעֶ֫קֶת‎</span> [[2Kgs.8.5|2Kgs 8:5]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעֲקִים‎</span> [[Gen.4.10|Gen 4:10]]; [[Exod.5.8|Exod 5:8]] — 

**1.** ***cry, cry out***, for help, usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person; — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** unto man [[Gen.41.55|Gen 41:55]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing), [[Num.11.3|Num 11:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.20.39|1Kgs 20:39]]; [[2Kgs.6.26|2Kgs 6:26]]; [[2Kgs.8.3|2Kgs 8:3]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> of thing), v[[2Kgs.8.5|2Kgs 8:5]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אמר‎</span> [[Exod.5.15|Exod 5:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Kgs.4.1|2Kgs 4:1]] and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person omitted) [[Exod.5.8|Exod 5:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Kgs.4.40|2Kgs 4:40]]; [[2Kgs.6.5|2Kgs 6:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** especially unto <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>: [[Gen.4.10|Gen 4:10]]; [[Exod.8.8|Exod 8:8]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּבַר‎</span> of thing), [[Exod.14.10|Exod 14:10]]; [[Exod.14.15|Exod 14:15]]; [[Exod.15.25|Exod 15:25]]; [[Exod.17.4|Exod 17:4]]; [[Exod.22.22|Exod 22:22]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעֹק יִצְעַק‎</span>), v.[[Exod.22.26|Exod 22:26]]; [[Num.12.13|Num 12:13]]; [[Num.20.16|Num 20:16]]; [[Josh.24.7|Josh 24:7]] (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.4.3|Judg 4:3]]; [[Judg.10.12|Judg 10:12]]; [[Deut.26.7|Deut 26:7]]; [[Isa.19.20|Isa 19:20]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> of thing), [[Lam.2.18|Lam 2:18]]; [[Neh.9.27|Neh 9:27]]; [[Ps.107.6|Ps 107:6]]; [[Ps.107.28|Ps 107:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺלִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶצְעָ֑קָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלאֿ‎</span> [[Ps.77.2|Ps 77:2]], compare [[Ps.34.18|Ps 34:18]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לי‎</span> [[2Chr.13.14|2Chr 13:14]]: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Ps.88.2|Ps 88:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***cry*** unto (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) idol [[Isa.46.7|Isa 46:7]]. 

**2.** absolute ***cry, cry out***, in distress, need; — [[Gen.27.34|Gen 27:34]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; with accusative of congnate meaning with verb), [[Deut.22.24|Deut 22:24]]; [[Deut.22.27|Deut 22:27]]; [[Isa.33.7|Isa 33:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּכָה‎</span>), [[Isa.65.14|Isa 65:14]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵילִיל‎</span>, opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָנַן‎</span>; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of thing), [[Jer.22.20|Jer 22:20]] (twice in verse) (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָתַן קוֺל‎</span>), [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵילִיל‎</span>), [[Job.35.12|Job 35:12]] with object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָמָס‎</span> [[Job.19.7|Job 19:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשַׁוַּע‎</span>). 

**3.** ***make outcry, clamour***, [[Isa.42.2|Isa 42:2]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשָּׂא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁמִיעַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺלוֺ‎</span> ). **Niph\`al** ***be summoned*** (i.e. to arms), absolute; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצָּעֵק‎</span> [[Judg.7.23|Judg 7:23]]; [[Judg.7.24|Judg 7:24]]; [[Judg.12.1|Judg 12:1]], so 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצָּֽעֲקוּ‎</span> [[Judg.10.17|Judg 10:17]]; [[2Kgs.3.21|2Kgs 3:21]], followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי שָׁאוּל‎</span> + accusative of location [[1Sam.13.4|1Sam 13:4]]. **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְצַעֵק‎</span> ***cry aloud***, in grief, [[2Kgs.2.12|2Kgs 2:12]]. **Hiph\`il** ***call together*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּצְפָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּצְעֵקאֶתהָֿעָם אֶליֿ‎</span> [[1Sam.10.17|1Sam 10:17]].
